title: Wheres my game?
body: Wheres my game with a Riot Employee

replies.body: 1116 games in, & I wasn't really expecting to play a game with a Rioter
It was more of a joke, way back when there was a smaller playerbase, for your 1000th win you would get to play with a Rioter.
Oh well I guess if it's just a joke...
I'll see you in about 400 more wins ;)
https://45.media.tumblr.com/6117c65bd9c9d5552c65a105dcae4fd1/tumblr_n0out3mOfw1tq4of6o1_500.gif

You're awesome xD I won't disappoint you sir

If you ever wanna play, hit me up.
I'll be here to ask for a game on my 2000 play btw >x)
http://i.imgur.com/oCLuUsc.gif
Ayeee wanna play? lmao
I'll add you.
bruh >xD
I've only played with Riot Natural20 that I know of, but Who's to say you havn't played with a riot member who just didn't have the name riot in their name :P {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}
Do such people exist?

some say they're a myth well others say a legend. We only know that like any super hero their identity must be kept secret :P 


couldn't find a good super teemo gif so http://cdn.gifbay.com/2012/11/epic_sax_teemo-13432.gif

Not to be a party popper but.....

http://s3.postimg.org/x0rijkigj/Example6.png

It's supposed to be FOR the thousand win marker, not immediately after :/

I had to wait almost 4 weeks for the Rioter I requested, to become available, but I did get my match ^_^

I never knew about this until after my 1k win so i was like meh. But i've had a few games with/against rioters.

Randomly played against a rioter in ascension mode. 
Randomly played against Riot Eh in a normal game a while back
Recently played against Riot KateyKhaos in an aram not too long ago. I said "Riot NiceBoardsLady" but i bet over half the riot office has their all chat turned off. I remember she played leblanc, there was a bard on her team setting up some dank portals, and I was kassadin.

I played in one of the one for alls that some of the rioters setup a while back. I've also randomly played with phreak because when he streams he often does games with viewers who get in his chat on league so i have it set to autojoin on startup.

It is nice to see a rioter every now and again in a random game as opposed to having a special game with them. If you think about it they must play the game a whole lot then. There are so many games going on at one time with even more players in them that the likelihood of chancing upon a rioter is very low, but it happens so i'm ok with it.
Oh nice, youve played with alot of them. I've played with Rivington but hes the only one.
Can I get one of you Rioters to please read the thread I just started? It is about a possible account booster that I have encountered. Thank you.

I have had a 1000 wins and didn't get a game with a Riot employee. My game with a Riot employee came, as I believe coincidentally, around my 1,200th win mark. And the Riot employee was a rude snarky douche bag. Why do you want a game with a Riot employee anyway? They don't even know how to play their own game and from all the evidence I've seen they're lil shit heads.
It was more of a joke man. Just cuz one (maybe more) that you've seen was rude doesn't mean they all are.
